info.title: Instagram private API
info.description: This is the collection of instagram private api which they use in the web.

tags.name: Web
tags.description: These endpints are only supported by web

tags.name: Mobile
tags.description: These endpoints are only suppored by the mobile

tags.name: Public
tags.description: This folder contains all the public accessable APIs that do not require authentication

parameters.name: user-agent

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the messages you want to get with the thread

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: ID of the thread you want to retrive

recipient_users.description: The JSON array of the users pk whome you want to send message. You can use thread_ids:[THREAD_ID] in place of this too.

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (33/13; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

max_id.description: next max id from the previous request. The cursor after which you want to fetch the feet.

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (33/13; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (33/13; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

parameters.name: x-entity-length
parameters.description: Size of the image in bytes, if known

parameters.name: x-entity-name
parameters.description: Name for the upload. Must be same as the url perameter

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (33/13; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

recipient_users.description: JSON array of user pk. You can aslo use threads_id instead

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (33/13; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (33/13; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

parameters.name: mark_as_seen
parameters.description: Waether to mark notification as seen or not

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (34/14; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (34/14; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

lsd.description: Important ! Should be same as the x-fb-lsd header

variables.description:
JSON object of :-
1. Shortcode : The shortcode of thr post that is at the end of post url
2. fetch_comment_count : Number of comment you wanna fetch with the post
3. fetch_tagged_user_count : The number of users that are tagged in the post

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/122.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.example: Instagram 237.0.0.14.102 Android (33/13; 440dpi; 1080x2262; Xiaomi/POCO; 22101320I; redwoodin; qcom; en_IN; 373310554)

parameters.name: recent_thread_limit
parameters.description: Number of thread for which you want to know last active status. 0 if you only want to get online people

parameters.name: suggested_followers_limit
parameters.description: Number of people for whome you want to know online status

parameters.name: cookie

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of followers you want to fetch

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of users to return in one request

parameters.name: cookie
parameters.example: mid=Zaq_FgALAAGmXqseJ7v8Uv7Tl7u7; ig_did=FFE459C1-99BF-4968-8476-2866EA716E71; ig_nrcb=1; datr=Fb-qZU4_T5yHxf6MskK50vXI; ps_n=0; ps_l=0; dpr=1.25; shbid="18008\05458236085766\0541740859360:01f76e57ad093c9d8b74c28429fc3ea50ac30a37bed376eaef0c5868061eb28f018d23d1"; shbts="1709323360\05458236085766\0541740859360:01f723c9e4c6e089e63a734bd18df228fb9e6e1eed5a787a730cd7d804b73f6dad410445"; ds_user_id=52834349844; csrftoken=qkR1s2Uf4tesXTltsoJH9gm0AfKCvmM8; sessionid=52834349844%3AFMRVaeuqcYbiBx%3A21%3AAYeP0Bb191n0JyN1P9csWDrqQu_Cu0vkDe1sR8eKcA; rur="CCO\05452834349844\0541741076350:01f7d0da7d695e011949a66919cbbf2a3e8f6e070b4464dddae3f11253a5f9b913395323"

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Only for business accounts. 1 for Primary, 0 for general
